com.ibm.gaiandb.draw

Class GradientColorAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ColorAction
      • com.ibm.gaiandb.draw.GradientColorAction

  • public class GradientColorAction
extends ColorAction

    Using the color palette provided as waypoints, returns a color along a gradient for each VisualItem passed to getColor(VisualItem). Only works for numerical (quantitative) data types.

    Based on prefuse's DataColorAction, but allows us to have values between the ones provided in the color palette.

        Creates a new prefuse color action which returns colors according to a gradient.
        Parameters:
        group - The prefuse data group.
        dataField - The data field from which to retrieve the values.
        dataType - The type of the data field.
        colorField - The prefuse color field.

        group - The prefuse data group.
        dataField - The data field from which to retrieve the values.
        dataType - The type of the data field.
        colorField - The prefuse color field.
        colorPalette - The color palette to base the gradient on.

      • getColorPalette

        public int[] getColorPalette()
        Retrieves the color palette currently being used in calculating the gradient.
        Returns:
        The gradient color palette, as an array of colors represented as integers.

      • setColorPalette

        Sets the color palette to be used to calculate the new gradient.
        Parameters:
        colorPalette - The new gradient color palette, as an array of colors represented as integers.

      • getMinValue

        public double getMinValue()
        Retrieves the value currently believed to be the minimum possible value stored in the data field. Used to determine the scale of the gradient.
        Returns:
        The minimum value of the data field.
